app_description:
I-App YoMthethosisekelo ithuthukiswa yi-  Yunithi Yokubusa Ngentando Yeningi Namalungelo   we-Fakhalthi Yezomtheth, eNyuvesi YaseKapa ngokubambisana ne  AfricanLII   and  Laws.Africa , ngoxhaso lwezimali oluvela ku  Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung . Inhloso yalolu hlelo wukuhlomisa amalunga ePhalamende laseNingizimu Afrika ngolwazi olunembayo nolugunyaziwe ngomthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika.

Kulolu hlelo lokusebenza (i-App), uzothola inguqulo ebuyekeziwe yomthethosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika, kanye nokuphawula kwezimiso zawo ezibalulekile kanye nokuhunyushwa kwazo yizinkantolo eziphakeme zaseNingizimu Afrika. I-App lena ikuvumela ukuthi upheqe futhi ufunde izifinyezo kanye nemibhalo egcwele wezinqumo zeNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo. Okuqukethwe kule-App kuyatholakala ungaxhunyiwe ku-inthanethi, futhi kuzobuyekezwa kabili ngonyaka.
contact_us:
Oxhumana naye

Zizwe ukhululekile ukudlulisa imibono yakho eyakhayo kanye neziphakamiso ku  info@africanlii.org.
copyright:
I-copyright
